---
---

# si nuevo jekyll web
ruby -v
bundle init
bundle config set --local path 'vendor/bundle'
bundle add jekyll
bundle exec jekyll new --force --skip-bundle .
bundle install

## edit gitignore

    # Ignore metadata generated by Jekyll
    _site/
    .sass-cache/
    .jekyll-cache/
    .jekyll-metadata

    # Ignore folders generated by Bundler
    .bundle/
    vendor/

# resto
bundle install
gem update jekyll
bundle exec jekyll serve
